articles.description: iPhone 14 Pro Max is now about $280 cheaper. This is not the first time that the company is activating a huge price cut for this series
articles.content: The iPhone 14 series is one of the best selling mobile phones in most parts of the world. Though this series is selling pretty well in China, the Chinese market is a very important but competitive ma… [+6111 chars]
